%s records

edit.title: Update attendance
edit.label: Is {{patient.fullName}} attending this session?
edit.true: Yes, they are attending this session
edit.false: No, they are absent from this session
edit.undefined: They have not been registered yet

success.GetConsent: [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}}) is attending the session. They still need consent to vaccinate.
success.CheckRefusal: [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}}) needs to leave the session because their parent or guardian refused to give consent.
success.NeedsTriage: [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}}) is attending the session. A nurse needs to triage their record.
success.Vaccinate: [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}}) is attending the session. They are safe to vaccinate.
success.Register: [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}}) needs to register for the session.

Present.label: Attending

count.other: [0] No children attending this session|%s children attending this session

Present.name: Registered as attending the session at {{location.name}}

Absent.label: Absent

count.other: [0] No children absent from this session|%s children absent from this session

Absent.name: Registered as absent from the session at {{location.name}}

count.other: [0] No children still to register|%s children still to register

success.create: Consent response from {{reply.fullName}} added to [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}})’s record
success.update: Consent response from {{reply.fullName}} updated on [{{patient.fullName}}]({{patient.uri}})’s record

parent.title: Who are you trying to get consent from?

title.Child: Does the child agree to having the {{campaign.name}} vaccine?
